Title: Holographic Microscopy with Acoustic Modulation for Detection of Nano-Sized Particles and Pathogens in Solution
Abstract: © 2019 The Author(s) 2019 OSA.We present a method for the detection of nanoparticles in solution using an acoustically actuated holographic microscope. This type of microscopy can be used for high-throughput biosensing applications, e.g., detection of viruses in a liquid.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
